title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 15.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 15.1 - Introduction

State Regulations
WHEREAS, the City of New York has duly enacted Local Law

No. 57 of 1996 (hereinafter referred to as "the local law"), which amended
chapter 8 of title 11 of the New York City Administrative Code (hereinafter
referred to as "the Code"), as authorized by chapter 1032 of the Laws of 1960
as amended by chapter 789 of the Laws of 1992; and
WHEREAS, chapter 8 of title 11 of the code imposes a tax on
the use of certain motor vehicles in New York City; and
WHEREAS, such local law added section 11-809.1 to the code, calling for the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to collect such tax on certain
motor vehicles; and
WHEREAS, section 11-809.1.k of the code authorizes the
commissioner of finance and the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to enter into an
agreement governing the collection of such tax; NOW, THEREFORE, the parties hereby agree as
follows: Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
15.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
